body_html:
It should be noted that in the Estimator documentation the input_fn could return a tf.Tensor (or a tuple). I initially wrote my code so that the input_fn would return just that, but predict generates an infinite iterator.

Am I misinterpreting the docs or do they need update?

cc @xiejw @mrry
body_text:
It should be noted that in the Estimator documentation the input_fn could return a tf.Tensor (or a tuple). I initially wrote my code so that the input_fn would return just that, but predict generates an infinite iterator.
Am I misinterpreting the docs or do they need update?
cc @xiejw @mrry
body:
It should be noted that in the [Estimator documentation](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/estimator/Estimator#predict) the `input_fn` could return a `tf.Tensor` (or a tuple). I initially wrote my code so that the `input_fn` would return just that, but `predict` generates an infinite iterator.

Am I misinterpreting the docs or do they need update?

cc @xiejw @mrry
